title: Shredded Mild Natural Cheddar Cheese
description: The mellow flavor of Sargento® Mild Cheddar is perfect for smothering your favorite nachos or melting over broccoli, brussels sprouts, potatoes and more.
cleaned_text: Available Sizes - 8 oz. Sargento® Shredded Mild Natural Cheddar Cheese, Traditional Cut, 8 oz. OFF THE BLOCK GREAT FOR NACHOS The deliciously mellow flavor of this Sargento® Shredded Mild Natural Cheddar Cheese is perfect for creating gooey nachos and melting over broccoli, cauliflower, omelets, baked potatoes and bowls of chili. Shredded from blocks of real cheese, this fine-cut mild Cheddar brings convenience to your kitchen and a rich, savory finish to all your favorite recipes. [Expand to see more](#collapseExample) - The mellow flavor of Sargento® Mild Cheddar is perfect for smothering your favorite nachos or melting over broccoli, Brussels sprouts, cauliflower, potatoes and more. - Sargento® Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese-Traditional Cut is always shredded fresh from blocks of real, natural cheese. - This 8-oz. package of Sargento® Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese - Traditional Cut contains 2 cups of shredded cheese. - Easy-close FreshLock® packaging helps keep cheese fresh longer, but use within five days upon opening for maximum freshness - Our Family's Passion Is Cheese Nutrition Highlights1/4 Cup Protein7g Calories110 Calcium15%DV Nutrition Facts 8 Servings per container Serving Size: 1/4 Cup (28g) Amount Per Serving Calories 110 % Daily Value* Total Fat 9 grams Saturated Fat 6 grams Trans Fat 0 grams Cholesterol 30 milligrams Sodium 180 milligrams Total Carbohydrates 1 grams Dietary Fiber 0 grams Total Sugars 0 grams Protein 7 grams Calcium 15% Iron 2% Potassium 20 milligrams The % Daily Value (DV) tells you how much a nutrient in a serving of food contributes to a daily diet. 2000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice. Ingredients: Cheddar Cheese [Pasteurized Milk, Cheese Culture, Salt, Enzymes, Annatto (Vegetable Color)], Potato Starch (ToPrevent Caking), Powdered Cellulose (To Caking), Natamycin (A Natural Mold Inhibitor). Cheddar Cheese [Pasteurized Milk, Cheese Culture, Salt, Enzymes, Annatto (Vegetable Color)], Potato Starch (ToPrevent Caking), Powdered Cellulose (To Prevent Caking), Natamycin (A Natural Mold Inhibitor). Our shredded cheddar cheeses bring an delicious smooth taste to your casseroles and mac and cheese. When it comes to cheese, we believe you deserve nothing but the best. Try our real, natural cheese with delicious flavor in every bite. Start every meal with something real. Create memories around the table with real, natural cheese
